overview: Billy 2000: Billy Goes Hollywood, the newest release from STUDIO 2000 is an action-filled video that is short on story and packed with non-stop driven sex. Set in a gift shop that sells Billy Dolls the video captures the fantasies of clerks and customers as they gaze on these gorgeous heartthrobs and imagine what life might be like with one of them as a partner. Some even imagine themselves as one of the Billy's with another Billy as their partner.
title: Billy 2000: Billy Goes Hollywood
